Preference.name: Style
Preference.description: The style of your autonomous life (default:'default', possible values: 'Shanghai', 'life2', ...)

Preference.name: Area
Preference.description: Store the default area of the autonomous life (0: stay seated; 1: stay here (can stand); 2: limited to the current area; 3: totally free)

Preference.name: ExcitingRatio
Preference.description: A modifier to change the excitement of a robot

Preference.name: FullExcitedAtStartup
Preference.description: Has Nao to be nearly completely excited at startup ? (default:false)

Preference.name: TryToStandMaxTime
Preference.description: Does Nao should try to stand the maximum of time possible without heating? (default:false)

Preference.name: FeetFixed
Preference.description: Is Nao has his feet fixed ? (default:false)

Preference.name: OverReactToNaoMark
Preference.description: Is Nao over reacting to naomark ? (default:false)

Preference.name: AdjustSoundVolume
Preference.description: Is Nao adjust sound volume to ambiance ? (default:true)

Preference.name: SoundVolume
Preference.description: The sound volume of your robots (used only if AdjustSoundVolume is enabled)

Preference.name: FreezeWhenProgrammed
Preference.description: Is Nao freeze when choregraphe connects to him ? (default:false)

Preference.name: DisableStiffness
Preference.description: Prevent Life to set/change the stiffness of the robot ? (default:false)
